caption.p: Clusters formatted according to the dominant compounds identified in varieties latifolia, minimum, lettuce and cinnamon, cultivated in the field conditions. ( a) Dominant compounds in var. latifolia (1st, 2nd and 3rd harvest) and var. minimum (1st and 3rd harvest); ( b) Dominant compounds in var. latifolia (4th harvest) and var. minimum (2nd harvest); ( c) Dominant compounds in var. lettuce (1st , 2nd, and 3rd harvest); ( d) Dominant compounds in var. cinnamon (1st, 2nd and 3rd harvest).
